text: okay confirmed, if i change the template to “page” in order to save it with the DND_area, it does not show up or let me select that template in settings for my blog listing template.

Looks like my solution is this-
 templateType: blog_listing.
not page afterall
Hi-- is there a way to add a class or ID to a dnd row/column? Is it possible by adding a div inside/outside the tags?

currently the only way to really get this functionality is by making a reusable section but you will only be able to add a class name to the section.

If you want to dig deep and get classes inside of a section you are likely looking at building your own module for that.
Thanks for helping! I was just trying to see if there was a work around but ended up just building my own
